entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who is nervous and suggests Disapparating under the Invisibility Cloak. She is also described as being able to produce bright blue flames.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as wearing the Horcrux and asking where they are after Disapparating.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is mentioned as something Harry was wearing.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: Hermione suggests using the Invisibility Cloak to Disapparate.

entities.name: forest of dean
entities.description: The Forest of Dean is mentioned as the location where they have Disapparated to.

relationships.description: Harry was wearing the Horcrux after Disapparating.
Hermione suggested using the Invisibility Cloak to Disapparate.
Harry and Hermione ended up in the Forest of Dean after Disapparating.
